<title level="1" right="Focus 5" pfs="Standard">
[Celestial Brand](/Spells.aspx?ID=2095)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Curse" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=566" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 262 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Bloodline**
[Angelic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=20)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1  unholy  creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 round
</row>

</column>

---

A blazing symbol appears on the target, cursing it to face divine justice. You and your allies receive a +1 status bonus to your attack rolls and skill checks against it. Anytime a [holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517) creature damages it, the holy creature deals an additional 1d4 spirit damage. The target is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The spirit damage increases by 1.
name: Celestial Brand
